name: magic-graph
description: Using graphs to find structure in unstructured data

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.setup:vault: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('.env')){fs.copyFileSync('.env.example','.env'); console.log('✓ Created .env file. Please edit it with your vault path.');} else {console.log('ℹ .env already exists');}"
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
